generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending from the foreground into the distance, bordered by sidewalks and buildings.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, separated by a curb and marked by bollards, and another sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, bordered by parked cars and a curb.
- building: Buildings are visible on both sides of the street, including a white building on the left and a multi-story building with ornate details on the right.
- wall: A white wall is visible on the right side of the image, running parallel to the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including a traffic sign pole with a blue circular sign and a red and white striped sign, as well as bollards along the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white arrow pointing down and to the right is visible, mounted on a pole. There is also a red and white striped sign indicating a parking restriction.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, providing shade and greenery.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible on the right side of the sidewalk, near the wall.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, appearing clear and blue.
- person: A person is visible standing near a motorcycle on the left side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road, including a blue car in the foreground and a white car behind it.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the left side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
